definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Pendants are also favorites because they're both functional and decorative.
sentences.chinese: 我也很喜歡墜飾吊燈，因爲它們既實用又好看。

sentences.english: The fluid drop shape gives any outfit a hint of romance. Why not combine it with the matching earrings?
sentences.chinese: 而線條流麗的水滴形墜飾，則爲裝扮注入浪漫氣息。

sentences.english: The metallic bracelet is silver-coloured and has a metallic charm in the shape of a peace sign.
sentences.chinese: 金屬手鍊是銀白色的，有和平標識形狀的墜飾。

sentences.english: Two rain drops dangle in clear crystal pavé.
sentences.chinese: 兩顆雨點墜飾鑲有透明密鑲水晶。

sentences.english: She liked necklaces made of turquoise, and long pendant earrings.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡綠寶石項鍊，及長墜飾耳環。

definition: item made from woven silk or rayon

lit. three humble visits to a thatched cottage/cf famous episode in the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义 in which Liu Bei 劉備|刘备 recruits Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (the Hidden Dragon 臥龍|卧龙) to his cause by visiting him three times
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
